channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260206.1)
item.description:
What's New

fix: correct history LIFO order for space and word saves

  • VNEngine: Save space to history BEFORE word in plain text and restore paths

to ensure correct restore order (pop word first, then space)

  • KeyboardEventHandler: Add waitForInjectionComplete() before word break

processing to prevent race conditions

  • Add comprehensive tests for history order fix (VNEngineHistoryOrderFixTests)
  • Bump build version to 20260206.1

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
